data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Maleki, Loghman, Malek, Masoumeh, Palm, Harry W. (2019): Five new species of Acanthobothrium (Cestoda: Onchoproteocephalidea) from the long-tailed butterfly ray, Gymnura cf. poecilura (Elasmobranchii: Gymnuridae) from the Persian Gulf and Gulf of Oman. Zootaxa 4609 (2): 289-307, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4609.2.5|10 occurrences
